CompressedPair#

template<typename T, typename U>
class CompressedPair : private hyperion::EmptyBaseClass<T>, private hyperion::EmptyBaseClass<U>#

Compressed Pair is an Empty Base Class Optimized pair type.

Requirements#

  • concepts::NotSame<T, U> because Empty Base Class Optimization can’t be performed when the types are the same, we can’t have a compressed pair wrapping two of the same type

Template Parameters

  • T – - the first type stored in the pair

  • U – - The second type stored in the pair

Public Types

using BaseT = EmptyBaseClass<T>#

The first Empty Base Class Optimized type in the pair.

using BaseU = EmptyBaseClass<U>#

The second Empty Base Class Optimized type in the pair.

Public Functions

inline constexpr CompressedPair() noexcept(concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseT, UnInitTag<T>> && concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseU, UnInitTag<U>>)#

Constructs an uninitialized CompressedPair

template<typename ...Args>
inline explicit constexpr CompressedPair(Args&&... args) noexcept(concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<T, Args...>)#

Constructs a CompressedPair with the T constructed from args and the U uninitialized.

Requirements#

  • concepts::ConstructibleFrom<T, Args...>: T must be constructible from args in order to construct a CompressedPair from them

Template Parameters

Args – - The types of the arguments to pass to T’s constructor

Parameters

args – - The arguments to pass to T’s constructor

template<typename ...Args>
inline explicit constexpr CompressedPair(Args&&... args) noexcept(concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<U, Args...>)

Constructs a CompressedPair with the U constructed from args and the T uninitialized.

Requirements#

  • concepts::ConstructibleFrom<U, Args...>: U must be constructible from args in order to construct a CompressedPair from them

Template Parameters

Args – - The types of the arguments to pass to U’s constructor

Parameters

args – - The arguments to pass to U’s constructor

template<typename T_, typename U_>
inline constexpr CompressedPair(T_ &&t, U_ &&u) noexcept(concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseT, T_> && concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseU, U_>)#

Constructs a CompressedPair from the pair of arguments.

Constructs a CompressedPair from the pair of arguments. Constructs the T from the T_ argument, t, and the U from the U_ argument, u.

Requirements#

  • concepts::ConstructibleFrom<T, decltype(t)>: T must be constructible from t to construct a CompressedPair from t and u

  • concepts::ConstructibleFrom<U, decltype(u)>: U must be constructible from u to construct a CompressedPair from t and u

Template Parameters

  • T_ – - The type of the argument to construct the T from

  • U_ – - The type of the argument to construct the U from

Parameters

  • t – - The argument to pass to T’s constructor

  • u – - The argument to pass to U’s constructor

template<typename U_>
inline constexpr CompressedPair(UnInitTag<T> t, U_ &&u) noexcept(concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseT, UnInitTag<T>> && concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseU, U_>)#

Constructs a CompressedPair from the pair of arguments.

Constructs a CompressedPair from the pair of arguments. Leaves the T uninitialized, and constructs the U from the U_ argument, u.

Requirements#

  • concepts::ConstructibleFrom<U, decltype(u)>: U must be constructible from u to construct a CompressedPair from u

Template Parameters

U_ – - The type of the argument to construct the U from

Parameters

  • t – - The uninit tag signaling to leave the T uninitialized

  • u – - The argument to pass to U’s constructor

template<typename T_>
inline constexpr CompressedPair(T_ &&t, UnInitTag<U> u) noexcept(concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseT, T_> && concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseU, UnInitTag<U>>)#

Constructs a CompressedPair from the pair of arguments.

Constructs a CompressedPair from the pair of arguments. Leaves the U uninitialized, and constructs the T from the T_ argument, t.

Requirements#

  • concepts::ConstructibleFrom<T, decltype(t)>: T must be constructible from t to construct a CompressedPair from t

Template Parameters

T_ – - The type of the argument to construct the T from

Parameters

  • t – - The argument to pass to T’s constructor

  • u – - The uninit tag signaling to leave the U uninitialized

inline constexpr CompressedPair(UnInitTag<T> t, UnInitTag<U> u) noexcept(concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseT, UnInitTag<T>> && concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseU, UnInitTag<U>>)#

Constructs a CompressedPair, leaving both the T and U uninitialized.

Parameters

  • t – - The uninit tag signaling to leave the T uninitialized

  • u – - The uninit tag signaling to leave the U uninitialized

template<typename U_>
inline constexpr CompressedPair(DefaultInitTag<T> t, U_ &&u) noexcept(concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseT, DefaultInitTag<T>> && concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseU, U_>)#

Constructs a CompressedPair from the pair of arguments.

Constructs a CompressedPair from the pair of arguments. Default-constructs the T, and constructs the U from the U_ argument, u.

Requirements#

  • concepts::ConstructibleFrom<U, decltype(u)>: U must be constructible from u to construct a CompressedPair from u

Template Parameters

U_ – - The type of the argument to construct the U from

Parameters

  • t – - The default init tag signaling to default-construct the T

  • u – - The argument to pass to U’s constructor

template<typename T_>
inline constexpr CompressedPair(T_ &&t, DefaultInitTag<U> u) noexcept(concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseT, T_> && concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseU, DefaultInitTag<U>>)#

Constructs a CompressedPair from the pair of arguments.

Constructs a CompressedPair from the pair of arguments. Default-constructs the U, and constructs the T from the T_ argument, t.

Requirements#

  • concepts::ConstructibleFrom<T, decltype(t)>: T must be constructible from t to construct a CompressedPair from t

Template Parameters

T_ – - The type of the argument to construct the T from

Parameters

  • t – - The argument to pass to T’s constructor

  • u – - The default init tag signaling to default-construct the U

inline constexpr CompressedPair(DefaultInitTag<T> t, DefaultInitTag<U> u) noexcept(concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseT, DefaultInitTag<T>> && concepts::NoexceptConstructibleFrom<BaseU, DefaultInitTag<U>>)#

Constructs a CompressedPair, default-constructing both the T and U

Parameters

  • t – - The default init tag signaling to default-construct the T

  • u – - The default init tag signaling to default-construct the U

constexpr CompressedPair(const CompressedPair&) noexcept = default#

Copy-Constructs a CompressedPair from the given one.

constexpr CompressedPair(CompressedPair&&) noexcept = default#

Move-Constructs a CompressedPair from the given one.

constexpr ~CompressedPair() noexcept = default#

Destructs this CompressedPair

constexpr auto operator=(const CompressedPair&) noexcept(concepts::NoexceptCopyAssignable<BaseT> && concepts::NoexceptCopyAssignable<BaseU>) -> CompressedPair& = default#

Copy-Assigns this CompressedPair from the given one.

constexpr auto operator=(CompressedPair&&) noexcept(concepts::NoexceptMoveAssignable<BaseT> && concepts::NoexceptMoveAssignable<BaseU>) -> CompressedPair& = default#

Move-Assigns this CompressedPair from the given one.

a reference to the wrapped T

Returns

a reference to the wrapped U

inline constexpr auto swap(CompressedPair &pair) noexcept(concepts::NoexceptSwappable<T> && concepts::NoexceptSwappable<U>) -> void#

Swaps the contents of this CompressedPair with the given one.

Parameters

pair – - The CompressedPair to swap contents with

template<typename T, typename U>
inline constexpr auto hyperion::swap(CompressedPair<T, U> &first, CompressedPair<T, U> &second) noexcept(concepts::NoexceptSwappable<T> && concepts::NoexceptSwappable<U>) -> void#

Swaps the contents of the first CompressedPair with the second one.

Template Parameters

  • T – - The first type stored in the pairs

  • U – - The second type stored in the pairs

Parameters

  • first – - The CompressedPair to swap contents to

  • second – - The CompressedPair to swap contents from
